descriptionSet.description: On this advertisement for Madhu canned Mangoes, the drawing of a family being served the advertised product can be seen. A sample-can is pictured as well. The right section of the image hosts a detailed as well as contact details of wholesellers etc.

inscription.text: Their Favourite Dish! Delicious and so Good for you!

Now, for a fraction of the usual expense, you can prepare Mango Ices, Mango Cream, Blane.mango and Mango Punch using delicious Madhu Mango Products. Expansion in canning equipment enables the Madhu organization to offer better quality at 25% reduction in prices.

Enjoy vitamin-rich, health-giving mango products like Mango slices, Mango Pulp, Mango Jam and Mango Squash. Also try Madhu Tomato Soup, Plums and Pears. Obtainable at leading stores. Madhu Canning Company

Chinchpokli, Bombay No. 12, *Phone: 41380 *Grams: "Emcici" Sole Agents: Jehangir Bros., Ahmedabad. For Gujarat & Kathiawar, S.R. Bugtani & Co., Karachi For Sind, Punjab & N.W.F. Provinces Madhu Canned Mangoes

location.name: Delhi / The Priya Paul Collection of Popular Art
Delhi / The Priya Paul Collection of Popular Art

rights.text: Copyrighted. Copyright with the original artists and publishers.
